sn32.55:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32.55:4.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṃ hotī”ti?
sn32.55:4.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya abbhaṃ hoti.
sn32.55:4.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṃ hotī”ti.
